description: A library of grids and other fine amusements. Contains a Grid andGrid-like data structures and optional modules for rendering them withpygame, creating cellular-automata simulations, games, and suchthings.
longdescription: A library of grids and other fine amusements. Contains a Grid andGrid-like data structures and optional modules for rendering them withpygame, creating cellular-automata simulations, games, and suchthings.
